welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sayreville! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, lively music scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Sayreville has to offer while you're here. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Linden Airport.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights with some international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving mainly international flights with some domestic destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the network for free for 30 minutes, after which they will need to pay for extended use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Formerly used by Pan Am, now used for Delta Air Lines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Main international terminal for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Main terminal for British Airways and other international airlines

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport
